descriptions:
**Advertisement:**

Introducing the exquisitely crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box, made from premium cedar wood, designed for placement in your beautiful outdoor space. This meticulously constructed box is glued and nailed together to ensure durability and longevity.

Adorned with a charming burned image of a squirrel by artist Drew Senesac, this Squirrel House adds an enchanting touch to any garden or landscape.

The thoughtful design includes a removable roof for easy cleaning, making maintenance effortless and hassle-free. The box also comes with two screws and washers included for secure mounting.

Boasting outside dimensions of 12 inches in height, 11 inches in width, and 10 inches in depth, the cozy inside dimensions measure 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth. The inviting squirrel opening is 3.5 inches, providing ample space for your furry friends to make their new home.

Transform your garden into a welcoming sanctuary for squirrels with the Squirrel House/Nesting Box – a perfect blend of functionality and artistry. Order yours today!

Introducing the Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box: your new best friend in attracting and caring for our furry, forest friends!

Crafted from high-quality, weather-resistant cedar wood, this Squirrel House boasts a beautiful, durable design. Its rustic charm extends beyond its construction, with an exquisite burned image of a squirrel, artistically rendered by Drew Senesac, welcoming your backyard guests.

This two-in-one Squirrel House offers both functionality and convenience. The removable roof ensures easy cleaning while providing the squirrels a choice in weather conditions. For mounting, it comes equipped with pre-drilled holes and includes 2 screws and washers for hassle-free installation.

Measuring at an inviting 12 inches tall, 11 inches wide, and 10 inches deep (inside dimensions: 5.75 inches width x 9 inches depth), this Squirrel House provides ample space for your woodland neighbors to create their perfect nest. With a generous squirrel opening of 3.5 inches in diameter, you can watch the joyous moments of these little creatures as they build their family and thrive in their new home.

Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to make a difference in your local wildlife community while also adding an eye-catching decorative touch to your garden! Order now and welcome squirrels into your backyard paradise.

**Advertising Description:**

Introducing the exquisite 'Squirrel House/Nesting Box' crafted from premium cedar wood, exclusively designed for your backyard!

This one-of-a-kind nesting box boasts a charming burned image of a squirrel, artfully created by renowned artist Drew Senesac, ensuring your garden will be the talk of the town. The perfect blend of style and function, it's both an inviting home for our woodland friends and an attractive addition to any outdoor space.

Measuring 12 inches in height, 11 inches in width, and 10 inches in depth, this cedar masterpiece provides ample room (5.75 inches by 9 inches) for squirrels to build their nest inside. The thoughtfully designed opening, sized at 3.5 inches, offers easy access for these adorable creatures.

Designed for convenience and durability, this 'Squirrel House/Nesting Box' comes equipped with a removable roof for hassle-free cleaning and maintenance. The included mounting hardware - two pre-drilled screws and washers - make installation a breeze. Simply attach the box to your chosen tree or post, and watch as nature takes its course!

Experience the joy of witnessing squirrels making their home in your very own 'Squirrel House/Nesting Box'. Order yours today and welcome these delightful creatures into your garden!

**Advertisement Description:**

Invite the charming and playful squirrels into your backyard with our exquisitely crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Made from premium cedar wood, this elegant abode is meticulously built with both glued and nailed construction to ensure durability and weather resistance.

Experience the delightful sight of a squirrel making its home in your very own garden, as they are drawn to the captivating burned image of a squirrel on the wall, skillfully crafted by renowned artist Drew Senesac. The intricate design is not only aesthetically pleasing but serves as an effective attraction for our furry friends.

Our Squirrel House comes equipped with a removable roof, making cleaning and maintenance effortless. This feature also makes the installation process straightforward, allowing you to easily hang the box wherever you desire in your outdoor space. Plus, the included mounting hardware, consisting of two screws and washers, simplifies the setup process even further.

Boasting outside dimensions of 12 inches by 11 inches by 10 inches and inside dimensions of 5.75 inches by 9 inches, our nesting box provides ample space for squirrels to feel comfortable and secure while they build their nest. The convenient squirrel opening, measuring 3.5 inches in diameter, ensures easy access for your new tenants.

Create a welcoming environment for these adorable creatures and enjoy the joy they bring to your backyard. Order now and make memories with your very own Squirrel House/Nesting Box!

Introducing the exquisitely crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box, made from premium cedar wood for a durable and long-lasting design. Perfectly suited for outdoor placements, this charming abode boasts a captivating burned image of a squirrel on one wall, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac.

Experience the convenience of its removable roof, allowing effortless cleaning access to ensure your new tenants feel right at home. Mounting your Squirrel House has never been easier with the included pre-drilled holes and mounting hardware featuring two screws and washers.

Measuring a generous 12 inches in height, 11 inches in width, and 10 inches in depth on the outside, and offering ample space inside of 5.75 inches by 9 inches, this nesting box caters to squirrels up to 3.5 inches in diameter for a comfortable fit.

Embrace nature's beauty with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box – the ultimate addition to your outdoor landscape!

**Advertising Description:**

Introducing the exquisitely crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box, made of 100% natural and durable cedar wood. Designed specifically for outdoor placement, this beautiful nesting box is not just a functional home for our furry friends but also an elegant addition to your garden or backyard.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this Squirrel House boasts a striking burned image of a squirrel, skillfully crafted by renowned artist Drew Senesac, adding a touch of whimsy and charm to your outdoor space. The box measures 12 inches in height, 11 inches in width, and 10 inches in depth on the outside, providing ample room for squirrels on the inside with dimensions of 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth.

The thoughtful design features a removable roof, allowing easy access to clean the box, ensuring optimal hygiene and comfort for your garden's residents. The box comes complete with mounting hardware, including two pre-drilled holes, screws, and washers, making it effortless for you to hang the house securely in your chosen location.

With its stylish burned image of a squirrel, removable roof for easy cleaning, and included mounting hardware, this Squirrel House/Nesting Box is not just an investment in providing a cozy home for wildlife but also an attractive enhancement to your outdoor living space. Order yours today and welcome the joy of watching nature thrive!
